message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8000, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $8200, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7800, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $7900, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7500, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $7600, but I think that's the lowest I can go.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $7400, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
